title: "Valoran will know harmony" - New Poppy
body: Yes, she still says this in champion selection. Any fix on this soon?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Unfortunately, I don't have an ETA for you, but we're aware of the issue and working to resolve it.
Alright, just glad Riot acknowledged it :)
what game mode is it happening in? I was playing a ranked poppy game almost an hour ago and she was saying her new VO  (would help riot narrow down the cause of her old VO)
